title: playsherbet
author: playsherbet
content: Quote from: Royse777 on February 22, 2023, 11:29:20 PM                TO DOPlay the SPACE XY with real money (single window)Take a screenshot (wait for the round to end then to show your winning) which includes:1. Part of display name and the multiplier you achieved with the winning.2. Part of bet history (My Bets tab) which includes recent bet history from the topFirst user to hit the exact multiplier will receive $50Target Multiplier for current round : 15.41xRULES:1. You must be a Sherbet player. Don't have a Sherbet account? Click here and join using the link.2. Sherbet player's terms and conditions applicable.3. All Bitcointalk members are eligible to accept this challenge.4. Once you make a submission, you can not edit the post.5. You can enter multiple times.6. You can win both challenges, hit the exact multiplier and win the highest multiplier.7. The week competition will end on 22nd December @23:59 UTC. Any entry after the deadline will NOT be considered for a qualified entry.ENTRY FORMAT:Reply with the following informationCode:Sherbet username: Multiplier achieved: [img width=700]https://i.ibb.co/GWS6p7f/completebet.png[/img] [img width=700]https://i.ibb.co/zNNKjZb/completebet-his.png[/img]Good Luck!Sherbet.com Team.

comments.author: playsherbet
comments.body: Thank you for joining our challenge. We already have a winner for this week, but we need to do some checking before handing out the prizes.
